CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 8, 1941, pg. 9, reads: "Jackie Ann Hamilton Four Years Old! - Little Jackie Ann Hamilton of Anaheim street celebrated her fourth birthday Tuesday when her mother gave a pretty party. Those who joined her in celebration were Sondra Pernell, Billy Chandler, Dorothy Lou [Dorothylou] Sands, Louise Scott, Nancy Lou Jones, Carol Marie Jones, Lois Jean Dougan, Sondra Sands, Carole McClain, Russell Goode, Everett Utterback, Jr., Frances Ruffin, Lola Ruffin, Arlene Canady, Judith West, Rosalind Cobbs, Lujene Bray, Willard Jones, Byrd Brown and Jane Randall. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Jackie Ann Hamilton, surrounded by boys and girls, including Dorothylou Sands on left, Everett Utterback Jr., Alice Smith, Billy Chandler, Sondra Pernell, Louise Scott, Nancy Lou Jones, Carol Marie Jones, Lois Jean Dougan, Sondra Sands, Carole McClain, Russell Goode, Frances Ruffin, Lola Ruffin, Arlene Canady, Judith West, Rosalind Cobbs, Lujene Bray, Willard Jones, Byrd Brown, and Jane Randall, gathered behind table with birthday cake patterned tablecloth in Hamilton's home, Anaheim street, for birthday party
